paper_abstract: In this paper, we are concerned about optimal two-dimensional optical orthogonal codes with lambda = 2. Some combinatorial constructions are presented and many infinite families of optimal two-dimensional optical orthogonal codes with weight 4 and lambda = 2 are obtained. Especially, we shall see that in many cases an optimal two-dimensional optical orthogonal code can not achieve the Johnson bound.
paper_title: Combinatorial Constructions for Optimal Two-Dimensional Optical Orthogonal Codes With lambda=2
